goal: Create the TreemapRenderer component using D3.js with Canvas rendering for performance. The component visualizes hierarchical data as a treemap with configurable size metrics (files, artifacts, errors, manifests), custom color scales, and click interaction for node selection.

contains.name: TreemapRenderer
contains.description: React component for Canvas-based treemap rendering using D3.js

contains.name: buildTreemapData
contains.description: Converts HierarchicalNode array to D3 hierarchy format

contains.name: getNodeColor
contains.description: Returns the color for a node using the provided color scale function

contains.name: calculateNodeSize
contains.description: Calculates the size value for a node based on the selected metric
